channel.title: Xavierborderie on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Xavierborderie on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.2.4
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.2.4 is now available. This is a security release for all previous versions of PrestaShop 1.7.

item.title: Contributor interview: Sullivan Sénéchal
item.description: An Open Source community is more than just PR made by faceless strangers. In order to better understand the people who contribute time and skills to the PrestaShop project, we’re launching a series of interviews with contributors of all ranges. This week, meet Sullivan Sénéchal!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Weekly - Week 41 of 2017
item.description: This edition of the Core Weekly report highlights changes in PrestaShop’s core codebase during the last week, from Monday 09th to Sunday 15th of October 2017.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Weekly - Weeks 39-40 of 2017
item.description: This edition of the Core Weekly report highlights changes in PrestaShop’s core codebase during the last two weeks, from Monday 25th of September to Sunday 8th of October 2017.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.2.3
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.2.3 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 17 issues reported on version 1.7.2.x.

item.title: A year into 1.6 maintenance: the way forward
item.description: A year ago, we released PrestaShop 1.7.0.0, and put version 1.6 in maintenance mode. The plan is to maintain it for two years, with regular patch releases. Approaching the one-year mark, time for a review!

item.title: Contributor interview: Andrej Staš
item.description: An Open Source community is more than just PR made by faceless strangers. In order to better understand the people who contribute time and skills to the PrestaShop project, we’re launching a series of interviews with contributors of all ranges. This week, meet Andrej Staš!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Weekly - Weeks 37-38 of 2017
item.description: This edition of the Core Weekly report highlights changes in PrestaShop’s core codebase during the last two weeks, from Monday 11th to Sunday 24th of September 2017.

item.title: The PrestaCrew is always hiring!
item.description: Looking to have an impact on +270.000 users all at once? Look no further! PrestaShop is always willing to hire new talents, and this special post will point to some specific roles we are looking to add to our current roster.

item.title: Contributor interview: Nick Zampieri
item.description: An Open Source community is more than just PR made by faceless strangers. In order to better understand the people who contribute time and skills to the PrestaShop project, we’re launching a series of interviews with contributors of all ranges. This week, meet Nick Zampieri!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Weekly - Week 36 of 2017
item.description: This edition of the Core Weekly report highlights changes in PrestaShop’s core codebase during the last week, from Monday 4th to Sunday 10th of September 2017.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.6.1.17
item.description: PrestaShop 1.6.1.17 is now available. This maintenance release has seen 17 pull requests merged since version 1.6.1.16.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Weekly - Week 35 of 2017
item.description: This edition of the Core Weekly report highlights changes in PrestaShop’s core codebase during the last week, from Monday 28th of August to Sunday 3rd of September 2017.

item.title: Contributor interview: idnovate
item.description: An Open Source community is more than just PR made by faceless strangers. In order to better understand the people who contribute time and skills to the PrestaShop project, we’re launching a series of interviews with contributors of all ranges. This week, meet the idnovate team!

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.2.2
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.2.2 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 8 issues reported on version 1.7.2.
